successes.title: Oval - The First Digital HandPan
successes.description: A new electronic musical instrument which allows you to play, learn and perform music using any sound you can imagine.

Pledges.description:
WEâ€™LL SEND BEAMS OF GRATITUDE TOWARDS YOU
The donation might be small but you gesture is grand and enormously helpful. Your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT
You will get a CD signed by RAVID .
Plus, you name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

CD + OFFICIAL T_SHIRT
You will get a CD signed by RAVID and One Oval official T-shirt. Your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

THE HANDPAN OFFICIAL NOTEBOOKS
Get the pack of the eight different notebooks and guides for the HandPans. It is the result of years of research and work by Ravid.

VERY EARLY BIRDS
Very Early Birds help us to get started! Limited to only 50 units! Get one Oval in white color. The first 50 backers will be able to preorder OVAL at this special price. You save 40% off retail price after the campaign. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website and two years of FREE access to ANY app we develop.

EARLY BIRDS
Early Birds help us to get started! Limited to only 250 units! Get one Oval in any of the 3 colors. The first 250 backers will be able to preorder OVAL at this special price. You save 33% off retail price after the campaign. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website, and two years of FREE access to ANY app we develop.

OVAL SOLO 
One Oval in any of the 3 colors. You save 16% off retail price after the campaign. Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

OVAL SOLO + CD + OFFICIAL T_SHIRT 
One Oval in any of the 3 colors. You save 16% off retail price after the campaign. You will get a CD signed by RAVID and One Oval official T-shirt.  Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

OVAL SOLO + OFFICIAL NOTEBOOKS 
One Oval in any of the 3 colors. You save 16% off retail price after the campaign. Get the pack of the eight different notebooks and guides for the HandPans. Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

OVAL SOLO + SHELL
One Oval in any of the 3 colors. You save 16% off retail price after the campaign and add the SHELL with your name engraved inside. Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

OVAL SOLO + OFFICIAL NOTEBOOKS + CD + OFFICIAL T_SHIRT
One Oval in any of the 3 colors. You save 16% off retail price after the campaign. Get the pack of the eight different notebooks and guides for the HandPans. Also you will get a CD signed by RAVID and One Oval official T-shirt. Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

OVAL DUO
Get two OVALS of your choice in any of the 3 colors, or one of each (choose your colors at the end of the campaign). Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

OVAL DUO + SHELL
Get two OVALS of your choice in any of the 3 colors, or one of each (choose your colors at the end of the campaign) and add two SHELL with your name engraved inside. Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

OVAL TRIO
Get three OVALs  of your choice in any of the  3 colors, or one of each (choose your colors at the end of the campaign). Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

OVAL TRIO + SHELL
Get three OVALs  of your choice in any of the  3 colors, or one of each (choose your colors at the end of the campaign) and add three SHELL with your name engraved inside. Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

OVAL QUARTET
Get four OVALs of your choice in any of the 3 colors (choose your colors at the end of the campaign). Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

OVAL QUARTET + SHELL
Get four OVALs of your choice in any of the 3 colors (choose your colors at the end of the campaign) and add four SHELL with your name engraved inside. Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

BE AN OVAL PARTNER
Get TEN OVALs of your choice in any of the  3 colors. (choose your colors at the end of the campaign). Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. As an extra thank you your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website.

THE OVAL COLLECTOR EDITION
Get the FIRST prototype of the OVAL instrument with your certificate serial number. You want to have this as it will be a museum piece someday! Free download of any OVAL app we will develop in the next two years. Your name will be listed at the supporter page in our website, with our eternal gratitude.
